metadata.title: Bilal Azhar assumes charge as Minister of State for Finance

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 13 (APP):Bilal Azhar Kayani on Friday formally assumed the charge of his office as Minister of State for Finance, following a notification issued by the Cabinet Division. The portfolio of Minister of State for Finance was assigned to Kayani, in addition to his existing responsibilities as Minister of State for Railways and Head of the Prime Minister's Delivery Unit, said a press release issued by the Finance Ministry.
